heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_marci
heroes.bio_loc: Admired by many, Marci's origins are known to nameless few. She travels mostly in the company of the Princess Mirana, but the roots of their friendship are entwined in secrets neither would ever needlessly reveal. To allies, she serves as fierce and honest companion. To enemies, she acts as dauntless deterrence against harming any she deems friend. Though unwise opponents may consider her size unremarkable, Marci possesses an inner power that imbues her strikes with incredible might. She'll decimate those who think to test her, but those who earn her favor will have an unflappable confidant for life.
heroes.hype_loc: Proving that undying loyalty yields unrivaled power, Marci always marches into battle ready to raise fists in defense of her companions. Effortlessly flinging friends and foes around the battlefield, she happily bounds into any brawl, able to grant allies a deadly edge and unleash a hidden power strong enough to make even gods reconsider the wisdom of a hostile path.
heroes.npe_desc_loc: Dashes around pummeling enemies with rapid attacks

facets.description_loc: While bodyguarded, Marci and her partner share a portion of health healed by this ability with each other.
facets.name: marci_buddy_system

facets.description_loc: Rebound can be alt-cast to bring Marci's ally with her after the jump.
facets.name: marci_pickmeup

facets.description_loc: Upon landing with Rebound, Marci gains a Fury combo.
facets.name: marci_fleeting_fury

abilities.name: marci_grapple
abilities.desc_loc: Marci grabs an allied or enemy target and throws it effortlessly behind her, damaging and slowing the unit if it's an enemy. Any enemy units in the landing area will also be damaged and slowed.
abilities.lore_loc: Marci excels at removing obstacles from Princess Mirana's path.

abilities.name: marci_companion_run
abilities.desc_loc:
Marci bounds to the targeted allied unit, choosing a direction and distance she will spring away from it. Upon reaching the unit, Marci lunges to her final destination, damaging and stunning enemies where she lands.

 The ally receives %ally_movespeed_pct%%% bonus movement speed for %ally_buff_duration%s.
abilities.lore_loc: With a friendly or brazen boost, Marci can find her way into the midst of any fight.
notes_loc: Marci's initial run to her target unit can be disjointed.
abilities.shard_loc: Increases damage. Rebound can be cast on enemies, and causes Marci to also get the speed boost when she casts it.
facets_loc:
When Rebound is set to alt-cast, Marci brings the target ally with her to her final destination. The ally deals %ally_impact_damage_pct%%% of the Rebound damage to the enemies around it's destination.

 Will not apply to Rooted or Leashed allies.

If Marci has Unleash leveled, after landing from Rebound, Marci gains a %postjump_flurry_charges% strike Fury combo. If Unleash is already active, its duration is instead extended by %postjump_unleash_duration%s.

 If upgraded by Aghanim's Scepter, the resulting Unleashed pulse will not silence enemies.

abilities.name: marci_bodyguard
abilities.desc_loc:
Passively grants Marci lifesteal and bonus attack damage.

Marci protects an allied hero. For %bodyguard_duration%s, the ally also gains %max_partner_penalty%%% of lifesteal and attack damage bonus. Whenever the ally attacks or is attacked by an enemy, Marci counter-attacks that target if they are within her attack range plus %bodyguard_attack_range_buffer%.
notes_loc: Marci cannot cast Bodyguard on herself.
Lifesteal effectiveness gets a %creep_lifesteal_reduction_pct%%% penalty against creeps.
facets_loc: While bodyguarded, Marci and her partner share %shared_healing_percent%%% of health healed by this ability with each other.

abilities.name: marci_special_delivery
abilities.desc_loc:
Marci whistles to instantly summon her courier to her.

Passively grants all allied couriers %bonus_levels% bonus levels and %bonus_hp_tooltip% bonus health.
notes_loc: Special Delivery whistle has a cast point of %abilitycastpoint% second.

abilities.name: marci_unleash
abilities.desc_loc:
Marci taps a hidden power, gaining Fury charges that allow her to deliver a rapid sequence of strikes that slow movement and attack speed of the target for %pulse_debuff_duration%s. The last strike in every Fury combo creates a damaging pulse around the target. In between Fury combos, Marci is unable to attack for %time_between_flurries%s.

Marci gains %bonus_movespeed%%% movement speed when Unleash is cast.
abilities.lore_loc: Though some have sought to understand its origins, Marci rebuffs all attempts to divine the source of her power.
notes_loc: Once a Fury combo is started, each attack must be delivered within 1s or the Fury combo expires.
abilities.scepter_loc:
Reduces Unleash cooldown by %scepter_cooldown_reduction% seconds and causes Unleash to apply a basic dispel on Marci. While Unleash is Active, all of Marci's abilities unleash pulses when cast. All of Marci's unleash pulses will silence units for %pulse_silence_duration% seconds.

DISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

talents.name: special_bonus_unique_marci_unleash_extend_duration
talents.name_loc: Unleash Duration Extended By {s:bonus_extend_duration}s On Kill
